name: BasketBrawlers
description:
GAME WILL BE OUT SOON™

BasketBrawlers is a 2.5D arcade fighting game where you play as either the Guardian or Assassin to dunk your opponent into either net. Using each character's unique direction attacks and aerials you can get combos and build up your meter. The more meter you have the stronger you hit! Use your meter to use each character's ultimate ability to get more points!

BasketBrawlers was made by a team of second year university students from the University of Ontario Institute of Technology, now branded as Ontario Tech University. We created our own framework using OpenGL C++ in eight months.

To play the game, just run BasketBrawlers.exe after extracting the files.
